events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position at our company. Thank you for your interest and taking the time to apply.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under the engineering department as a software developer candidate based on your resume and background.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case to assist you further in the hiring process for our software engineer role.
The initial screening call was completed successfully. We discussed your experience in software development and your fit for the engineering team.
Thank you for your prompt response and availability for the next step. We appreciate your enthusiasm towards the software engineer opportunity.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for next week. This session will focus on your coding skills, system design experience, and problem-solving abilities.
The technical interview was successfully completed. You demonstrated strong software engineering skills and a clear understanding of development best practices.
We have scheduled the HR interview to further discuss your cultural fit, career aspirations, and other employment details.
